operationMaster.AddOperation_operationType_container: Select the Operation Type from the dropdown.
operationMaster.AddOperation_technology_container: Select the Technology name from the dropdown.
operationMaster.AddOperation_VendorCode: Select the Vendor (Code) from the dropdown.
operationMaster.AddOperation_DestinationPlant_container: Select Destination Plant (Code) from the dropdown.
operationMaster.AddOperation_Plant_container: Select the Plant (Code) from the dropdown.
operationMaster.AddOperation_Customer_container: Select the Customer (Code) from the dropdown.
operationMaster.AddOperation_LabourRatePerUOM: Enter the labour rate per UOM.
operationMaster.AddOperation_EffectiveDate: Select the Effective date from here.
operationMaster.AddOperation_SurfaceTreatmentCheckbox: Check the checkbox to indicate Surface Treatment.
operationMaster.AddMoreOperation_container: Click here to add more operation details.
operationMaster.AddOperation_Cancel: Click here to cancel the form.
operationMaster.AddOperation_Save: Click here to save the operation.
operationMaster.AddOperation_SendForApproval: Click here to send the operation for approval.
